description: '''Amerie Mi Marie Rogers Nicholson''' (born January 12, 1980) is an American singer, songwriter, actress and writer. She has released four studio albums to date: ''[[All I Have (album)|All I Have]]'' (2002), ''[[Touch (Amerie album)|Touch]]'' (2005), ''[[Because I Love It]]'' (2007), ''[[In Love & War (Amerie album)|In Love & War]]'' (2009). She is best known for her 2005 single "[[1 Thing]]".
